intro: Glottidium, commonly known as the golden groundsel, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Glottidium is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and hardy nature.
